statements: SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT employee_id, access_permissions FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE access_permissions = 'admin';
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_image FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, access_permissions FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_image FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE access_permissions LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT employee_id, access_permissions, hand_geometry_image FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_id FROM Employee;
SELECT fingerprint_data FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM AccessPermissions;
SELECT employee_id, fingerprint_data FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AccessPermissions WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(access_level) AS avg_access_level FROM AccessPermissions;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM AccessPermissions WHERE employee_id = 2 OR access_level < 5 ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_name, hand_geometry_data FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT permission_type, access_level FROM access_permissions WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT employee_name, permission_type FROM employees JOIN employee_access USING (employee_id) JOIN access_permissions USING (permission_id);
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hand_geometry_data FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;

SELECT employee_name AS name, access_level FROM employees JOIN employee_access ON employees.employee_id = employee_access.employee_id JOIN access_permissions ON employee_access.permission_id = access_permissions.permission_id;

SELECT employee_name, permission_type FROM employees JOIN employee_access ON employees.employee_id = employee_access.employee_id JOIN access_permissions ON employee_access.permission_id = access_permissions.permission_id WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hand_geometry_data @> '{"hand_left": {"fingers": 5}, "hand_right": {"fingers": 5}}';
SELECT * FROM employee_data;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employee_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'Admin';
SELECT employee_id, access_id FROM employee_access ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, role_name FROM employee_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT * FROM employee_data;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employee_data ORDER BY employee_id DESC;

SELECT emp.employee_id, emp.hand_geometry_data, acc.permission_level FROM employee_data emp JOIN employee_access eacc ON emp.employee_id = eacc.employee_id JOIN access_permissions acc ON eacc.access_id = acc.access_id;
SELECT emp.employee_id, emp.hand_geometry_data, role.role_name FROM employee_data emp JOIN employee_roles role ON emp.employee_id = role.employee_id;

SELECT emp.employee_id, role.role_name, acc.permission_level FROM employee_roles role JOIN employee_access eacc ON role.employee_id = eacc.employee_id JOIN access_permissions acc ON eacc.access_id = acc.access_id ORDER BY role.role_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM access_permissions;
SELECT permission_description FROM access_permissions;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;

SELECT employees.first_name, access_permissions.permission_description FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_access ON employees.employee_id = employee_access.employee_id INNER JOIN access_permissions ON employee_access.permission_id = access_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY first_name DESC;
